channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Donald Trump Could Weaponize US Surveillance in a Second Term
item.description: Donald Trump has vowed to go after political enemies, undocumented immigrants, and others if he wins. Experts warn he could easily turn the surveillan...

item.title: Spotify to increase premium pricing in the US to $11.99 per month
item.description: Spotify has announced that it’s hiking subscriptions for customers in the U.S., the second such price increase in the space of a year. The music-strea...

item.title: 6 Best Cheap Smartphones (2024): iPhone, Android, 5G
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $150 to $500—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: UK neobank Monzo reports first full (pre-tax) profit, prepares for EU expansion with Dublin hub
item.description: Monzo has announced its 2024 financial results, revealing its first full-year pre-tax profit. The company also confirmed that it’s in the early stages...

item.title: 16 Best Festival Accessories and Gear (2024): Fanny Packs, Inflatable Couches, and More
item.description: No matter the genre or location, these gadgets will upgrade your experience.

item.title: Inside Apple’s efforts to build a better recycling robot
item.description: Last week, TechCrunch paid a visit to Apple’s Austin, Texas manufacturing facilities. Since 2013, the company has built its Mac Pro desktop about 20 m...

item.title: Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer Review: Fast Drying and New Smart Attachments
item.description: It’s not just hot air. Dyson’s new dryer has impressive smart features and attachments, in addition to the high price tag.

item.title: Binit is bringing AI to trash
item.description: Early attempts at making dedicated hardware to house artificial intelligence smarts have been criticized as, well, a bit rubbish. But here’s an AI gad...

item.title: Nubia Flip 5G Review: Cute, Cheap, and Flawed
item.description: Compact, cute, and fairly cheap, Nubia’s Flip 5G could be your first foldable, but the software lets it down.

item.title: Temasek, Fidelity buy $200M stake in Lenskart at $5B valuation
item.description: Temasek has previously invested in Lenskart, and this new funding follows a $500 million investment by the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority last year. ©...
